revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "Chairemon, son of . . .pearmos, 44 dr. with the addition,;Petearmouthis, son of Petesouchos, 16 dr. with addition,;Apollonis, son of Mysthes, 12 dr.,;Esouris, son of Psenathos, 24 dr.,;Petearmouthis, son of Mysthos, 24 dr.,;Peteuchos, son of . . .kphreus, 8 dr.,;Nekpheros, son of Petesouchos, 12 dr.,;Esouris, son of Apynchis, 8 dr.,;308;4, Mellas, son of Tryphon, 4 dr.,;Hermias, son of Petearmotos, 4 dr. ,;Anoubion, son of Praxias, 8 dr. with the addition,;Hareotes, son of A[..]onis, 4 dr. with the addition,;Sambas, son of Herakles, 4 dr.,;Herakleides, son of Sambas, 4 dr.,;Dioskous, son of Sambas, 4 dr.,;Psamis, likewise 4 dr. with the addition,;Phasis, son of Mysthes, 4 dr. with the addition,;Akousilaos, son of Satabous, [? dr.],;5th, . .,;. . ., son of Ambesis the embalmer, 4 dr.,;Phasis, son of Petosiris, son of Lakon, 20 dr., ;. . .]es, son of Dioskourides, 4 dr.,;. . .]s, son of Ptollis, 4 dr.,;. . .]ouotis, son of Ptollis, 4 dr.,;. . .]bas, son of Haropos, 8 dr. with the addition,;Pantbeus, son of Horion, 4 dr.,;Anoubion, son of Thaesis, 12 dr.,;Peteuchos, 24 dr. with the addition,;Herakleides, son of Palos, 4 dr.,;Orsenouphis, son of Petalos, 4 dr.,;Ischyrion, son of Bisos, 12 dr.,;Horos, son of Pachnoubis, 4 dr.,;Apynchis, son of Herakleidou, 8 dr.,;Pakous, son of Onnophris, 8 dr.,;124;another 5th, Sisois, 16 dr.,;16."
